Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit was constructed with Ni-GDC (gadolinia-doped ceria) as the anode, YSZ as the electrolyte, and Cu-added La0.58Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta-GDC as the cathode.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode
Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode

Sentencas: The CO formation rate, the CO2 conversion and the generated current density increase with increasing CO2 concentration and temperature.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode

Sentencas: The CO2 conversion rate equals exactly the CO formation rate.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode
Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode

Sentencas: The activation energy is 2.72 kcal mol(-1).
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode

Sentencas: The electrochemical CO2 reduction (dissociation) can have much lower activation barrier than the catalytic one.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode

Sentencas: Simultaneous CO2 reduction with power generation in SCFCs can be feasible.
Titulo: Electrochemical CO2 reduction with power generation in SOFCs with Cu-added LSCF-GDC cathode
